ygData.msgSnippet: ... He ran towards the hovering Destructor. Hey, Destructor! Let KitKat down! Your getting her killed! He turned and pinpointed one of the attackers, Serge.

::DrillBit::

He ran towards the hovering Destructor.

"Hey, Destructor! Let KitKat down! Your getting her killed!"

He turned and pinpointed one of the attackers, Serge.
"This battle will cost you your lives!" 
He opened gattaling gun fire.

::Hot Rod::

He felt embarissed about saying that too her.
"Um... yeah, we did," was all he could manage to say.

He poped one of the energon snacks into his mouth, and sipped the
energin.

OOC: Welcome back, Logo!
